BuyBetter.description: My entry for the ShellHacks 2024 hackathon. Webapp that takes in receipts to find personalized resources assisting in finding cheaper purchase alternatives, made with a vanilla Typescript Node.JS backend.

SiteGEN.description: Application utilizing webscrapers and OpenAI APIs to automate the creation of a static website using user-provided social media data to customize a diverse range of HTML/CSS templates.

Imgscrpr.description: Discord bot creating a personalized and adaptive Reddit feed through an ordered graph of all subreddit relations, with MongoDB, Typescript, and Node.JS under the hood.

Threespective.description: View three dimensional space in another way through a 2D cross section simulation. Built using linear algebra, height map made with Voronoi cells, and strictly rendering in the HTML5 canvas.

Roe Bros Pizza.description: Single page website that made for a local pizza company operating in my area. Written in vanilla HTML and CSS.

Renderspice.description: A 2D game engine for the web that strictly uses the HTML canvas, and was built in pure Javascript code.

Spicefall.description: My entry for the Kajam 2022 competition, utilizing the Kaboom game engine and Typescript, and built in under a week.

Domain Coloring.description: Tool to help visualize transformations on the complex plane.
